thread.section_title: B Montmartre Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely little hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely little hotel - Review of B Montmartre Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Trinity S
title: Lovely little hotel
text: Stayed here for a week and really enjoyed it. The location is perfect, so close to the Metro and the fabulous area on Monmartre. The hotel room was very small but that is Paris for you and we knew when booking. The room has everything you would need, the bathroom is well equipped with a large rain shower and nice products that are replenished daily. The staff were really friendly and helpful and the housekeeping staff were fantastic. Would definitely recommend this hotel and area for anyone traveling to Paris.
